content.rendered:
Tim is a marine engineer with a Class 1 Steam Certificate of Competency. He has been involved in LNG life extension and conversion projects during his time as a ship manager and has a strong background in examination of fleet performance, project management, dry dock trouble shooting and planned maintenance strategies. Recently Tim has been involved in the operation of DFTE plant, exhaust gas scrubber and BWT installations and low Sulphur fuel conversions.

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Vessel operation and management, primarily focused on tankers and LNG/LEG/LPG. Extensive steam vessel operation experience

Contact

Singapore +65 9655 6240

jetpack-related-posts.title: DP FMEA & Audit - Dynamic Positioning
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide an experienced multidisciplinary team of engineering and operational resources to support the DP industry. Aqualis delivers dynamic positioning services including DP FMEA, DP audit, DP Assurance and DP project management.
